title: Moderate-speed city driving on a clear day
caption: The ego vehicle drives straight on a clear day, passing a parked truck and a pedestrian crossing the street.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 2 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (glareDay). The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed (average speed â‰ˆ 8.2 m/s). No significant braking is observed in this window.
description: The road is a straight, four-lane city street with a speed limit of 40 km/h. The traffic is moderate, with several cars driving in the opposite direction. The weather is clear, with no visible fog or rain. There are several traffic lights and stop signs along the road, all of which are visible and displaying a green light. The pedestrian crossing the street is located on the right side of the road.
reasoning: The ego vehicle maintains a moderate speed, keeping a safe distance from the parked truck and the pedestrian crossing the street. It is prepared to slow down or stop if necessary, as indicated by the green traffic lights. The driver is attentive to the potential risks of pedestrians crossing the road and other vehicles driving in the opposite direction.
